About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 9am-5pm by appointment; closed Dec 23 -Jan 2. General reference assistance available. No copying services available.

About.Acquisition focus: History of establishment and development of the Campus.

About.Major holdings: Mercy Teachers' College: Student records 1912- (6m). Congregation of the Sisters of Mercy, Victoria and Tasmania: Letters, Minutes 1912- (8m). Archdiocese of Melbourne: Letters, Minutes. Victorian Council of Education: Letters.
